data.text: Welcome to the new announcement section. It will keep you up-to-date with important news. You can dismiss this announcement by clicking on the button at the end of this line.
Opensubtitles.org is now only accessible to VIP users. If you're still using it and do not plan to get a VIP subscription, you should consider disabling it and move to opensubtitles.com.
We're about to drop support for legacy Sonarr and Radarr versions (prior to v3). If you're still using those legacy versions, please consider upgrading ASAP.
